description: Detects a Windows command line executable started from MSHTA Author: Michael Haag. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: MSHTA Spawning Windows Shell
query: (process.parent.executable:*\\mshta.exe AND (process.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe OR *\\sh.exe OR *\\bash.exe OR *\\reg.exe OR *\\regsvr32.exe) OR process.executable:*\\BITSADMIN*))
